His paperwork was located in 5 North. [b(6); b(7)(C)] says everything was in there [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] even teamed him [b(7)(C)] gave him visiting forms to mail out; contact sheet so that he can complete to add on his phone; social call; UDC, etc. Thanks.
